general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and departments within Sharda University, including the Schools of Dental, Medical, and Nursing Sciences. It also lists key reports and initiatives such as the Examination Annual Report, Academic Bank of Credits, curricula feedback, and university brochures. Additionally, it covers aspects of university life, development, and international presence, referencing things like the perspective plan, leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, and specific services like family and couple counseling, and FM radio. Important administrative and student support information is also present, including visa guidelines, medical insurance, mentoring portals, and online resources for reporting cybercrime.

career_info.summary: This program offers career opportunities in the Health Care and R&D sectors, with average annual packages ranging from 4.50 LPA to 12.00 LPA, providing a pathway to a career in engineering.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Health Care and R& D sector
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 12.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in engineering.
